thread.title: Patriots DC Matt Patricia sports Roger Goodell clown shirt for Boston arrival
thread.title_full: Patriots DC Matt Patricia sports Roger Goodell clown shirt for Boston arrival

author: Kirstie Chiappelli (kchiappelli@sportingnews.com)
title: Patriots DC Matt Patricia sports Roger Goodell clown shirt for Boston arrival
text:
February 6, 2017 5:50pm EST February 6, 2017 5:50pm EST American Football, News, English, NFL, Atlanta Falcons, New England Patriots, Tom Brady, Super Bowl Tell us how you really feel, Matt. Matt Patricia (Getty Images) 
Updated at 5:50  50 p.m. ET 
Just because Tom Brady and Bill Belichick didn't take a shot at Roger Goodell after their historic Super Bowl win doesn't mean Matt Patricia can't. 
The Patriots defensive coordinator was spotted wearing a T-shirt that showed the NFL commissioner's face with a clown nose as the team exited its plane at Logan Airport in Boston on Monday afternoon.
